item.description:
Just an evening of shared light Supper.

I will make a Soup for all, depending on a day, if its hot- cold soup,. if the day is cold ...the soup is going to be hot...to observe yin and yang, i guess?...
will make a Salad too.. arugula!
your part is wine, beer..whatever your drink.. and a good spirit!
ideas for the summer?
outdoor swimming pool for $5 , right at the Brook House , an option, if you'd like!

http://www.brookhouse...

Will update with exact address to "Yes" and "Maybe" people.
Brookline Village, rt 9, by Longwood Medical.
Will orient on free parking around.
Hopefully it will become a tradition.

Questions?
Please call : 781-718-6203,
Maia
p.s. the pic title is :"Impressing your Friends" http://www.bing.com/i...

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: SS over S anyone?
